channel.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im making my own pk system, first i did addItem(6356,1000), so when u kill someone u get tokkuls, i use tokkuls in my pk rewards shop. So pretty much u kill someone and get tokkuls. But i found a problem, When u kill someone, the person who dies get the tokkuls, how would i fix? Thanks
-Owner Will

item.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

um, were would i add this, i added under one of the other deathstages…Didn’t work…

Please help…

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

well then just add this, because none of us can fix it

if(deathstage == 1) && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) && playerHasItem(6529)) { deleteItem(6529, 1000); }

I don’t know where to put it, and I dont think its right.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Ok, that didnt work, the additem works fine, So when you kill someone in pk, you get 1000 tokkuls, that fine. The problem is, when you die, you also get 1000 tokkuls, not from pking but from getting killed by an npc, what do I do now?

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Grr. None of you are even close to fixing the problem. You want tokkuls with the drop correct?

addItem will add item to the player who died, because it is saying, when the person has died add 1000 tokkuls.

Your using Delta, so try something with this.

if (!IsInFightCave() && !inFunPk() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); dropItem(6529, slot); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+".");

Not sure if It’d work, but just search for “drop” and you will come up with results.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Ok when you kill someone you get the tokkuls, but now when u get killed my an npc you also get tokkuls.

What do i do now?

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

addItem(6529,1000);

Would mean it’d add the item with the ID of 6529, quantity 1000, to the person that dies.

killerz.addItem(6529,1000);

Would mean it’d add the item with the ID of 6529, quantity 1000, to the person that is victorious in the fight.

Also, you can’t rep unless you’re 15+ rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Help(will Rep+)
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:6, topic:346352”]isnt that what I already have? the code thing isnt supposed to be there…lmao

-Will[/quote]

or just change the addItem(6529,1000); to killerz.addItem(6529,1000);
